entry.p: The other night I finished the first draft of an essay entitled "Friendship in Atlas Shrugged", which I've promised to Ed Younkins for a collection he's editing for publication in 2007 (the fiftieth anniversary of the publication of Ayn Rand's magnum opus). The collection is tentatively entitled Atlas Shrugged: A Philosophical and Literary Companion and it appears that the good people at Ashgate Press have agreed to publish it. If you really want to read this essay and comment on it so that I can improve it before publication, do let me know.
